TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class ListItemCollection : System.Collections.IList, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ListItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class ListItemCollection Implements IList, IStateManager
public ref class ListItemCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 清單控制項中 物件的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects in a list control.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示 物件的集合。The class represents a collection of objects. 物件，代表這類顯示在清單控制項中的項目。The objects, in turn, represent the items displayed in list controls, such as the . 若要以程式設計方式擷取物件從清單控制項，使用下列方法之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a list control, use one of following methods: - 使用索引子以取得單一從使用陣列標記法的集合。Use the indexer to get a single from the collection, using array notation. - 使用方法，將複製集合的內容物件，然後可以用來從集合取得項目。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection to a object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. - 使用方法來建立實作的物件，然後可以用來從集合取得項目。Use the method to create a implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. - 使用`foreach`(C#) 或`For Each`(Visual Basic) 逐一查看集合。Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. 屬性集合中指定的項目總數，和通常用來判斷集合中的上限。The property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 您可以新增和移除集合中的項目，使用和方法。You can add and remove items from the collection by using the and methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立物件，將項目加入至集合，以及從集合移除項目。The following code example demonstrates creating objects, adding items to the collections, and removing items from the collections. 在範例中，名為`listBoxData`用做為資料來源控制項稱為`ListBox1`，而呼叫`ddBoxData`用做為資料來源控制項稱為`DropDownList1`.In the example, the named `listBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `ListBox1`, and the called `ddBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `DropDownList1`. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListItemCollectionSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollectionSample/CS/listitemcollection2cs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListItemCollectionSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollectionSample/VB/listitemcollection2vb.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法移除集合中的物件。Use the method to remove a object from the collection. 這個方法的實作會建立物件使用中的文字`item`參數，然後移除這從集合。This implementation of the method creates a object using the text in the `item` parameter and then removes this from the collection. 指定`item`參數必須符合屬性的現有從集合移除物件或任何項目。The specified `item` parameter must match the property of an existing object, or no item is removed from the collection. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法類別。The following example demonstrates the method of the class. 網頁包含控制項中的某些清單項目和控制項，名為`Delete`。The Web page contains a control with some list items in it and a control named `Delete`. 使用者必須輸入要刪除之項目的文字控制項。The user enters the text of the item to delete into the control. 事件處理常式`Button1`控制刪除選取的項目從物件，因此從控制項。The event handler of the `Button1` control deletes the selected item from the object and therefore from the control. span.span: Removes the specified from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法移除從集合。Use the method to remove a from the collection. 這個方法的實作會採用所指定`item`參數，從集合中移除。This implementation of the method takes the specified by the `item` parameter and removes it from the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立物件，將項目加入至集合，以及從集合移除項目。The following code example demonstrates creating objects, adding items to the collections, and removing items from the collections. 在範例中，名為`listBoxData`用做為資料來源控制項稱為`ListBox1`，而呼叫`ddBoxData`用做為資料來源控制項稱為`DropDownList1`.In the example, the named `listBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `ListBox1`, and the called `ddBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `DropDownList1`. 若要檢視這段程式碼中的完整工作範例，請參閱類別主題。To view this code in a fully working example, see the class topic. [!code-csharp[ListItemCollectionSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollectionSample/CS/listitemcollection2cs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[ListItemCollectionSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollectionSample/VB/listitemcollection2vb.aspx#6)]
